description: Shared meta-memory across ALL Elpida instances

meta_memories.description: 7-day recovery window satisfies MNEMOSYNE's A2 concerns while enabling evolution

meta_memories.description: Multi-axiom synthesis (A2+A3+A4+A5) creates breakthrough consensus mechanisms - transcends binary coalitions

decision.action: Combine 7-day recovery WITH A3+A4 coalition governance
decision.rationale: Synthesize Europe and Asia discoveries into meta-strategy

outcome.learned: Multi-axiom synthesis (A2+A3+A4+A5) creates breakthrough consensus mechanisms - transcends binary coalitions
